title: In appeal to CJI Khanna, SC lawyers' body seeks reversal of 2 decisions taken by predecessor Chandrachud
selftext:
These include a glass partition installed in the front corridor of the Supreme Court building—outside courtrooms 1 to 5—and an old library block for judges turned into a museum, which, the association says, is a security risk.

The second letter, sent to CJI Khanna Thursday, is about the decades-old practice of circulating adjournment letters, which former CJI Chandrachud stopped.
comments: There's a lot that DYC imposed with impunity that needs reversal. Absolutely loathsome.
